name: Garlic Pita Bread Bites
author: LISAREBBECHI
summary: Great and easy to make--as well as delicious. Everyone goes crazy about these when I make them.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package pita bread, cut in half
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Open pita bread halves and roughly cut into approximately 2 inch pieces
Arrange on a medium baking sheet
In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter and mix in garlic and dried Italian-style seasoning
Pour the mixture over pita bread pieces
Sprinkle bread with Parmesan cheese, adjusting the amount as desired
Bake in the preheated oven 10 minutes, or until lightly browned
